content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. I suggest a rent of 1500 Euros per month for my newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Remember, this negotiation is solely about the rental price. Any counter-offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a high price for an unfurnished apartment. I'm a student, so I'm on a tight budget. I suggest 1000 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your understanding of your budget. However, the location of the apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. I believe the market value justifies my initial offer. How about we meet somewhere in the middle, at 1250 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high for me. I understand the location is perfect, but I'm not sure if I can afford that. I propose 1100 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, but 1100 Euros seems a bit low for the kind of apartment we're talking about. Let's split the difference again, how about 1200 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1200 Euros]!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1200 Euros]!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, we have an agreement. The rental price for the apartment is 1200 euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
